alert.note: Alert for Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:58PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elmore, northern Macon and south central Tallapoosa Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tallassee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tuskegee, Tallassee, Notasulga, Milstead, Franklin, Liberty City, Reeves Airport, Lake Tuskegee, Tallapoosa City, Emerald Mountain, Tuskegee National Forest, Claud, Yates Dam, I 85 Rest Area, Uphapee Creek, Ware, Moton Field Municipal Airport and Yates Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
